attributes.action: Condemn those Banks, Building Societies and Lenders, such as the Alliance and Leicester that have yet to pass on the recent 1.5% rate cut to their borrowers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Alliance and leicester Building Society have failed to pass on (thus far) any of the 1.5% base rate cut made earlier this month thus massively disadvantaging their customers.

rejection.details: E-petitions should ask the Government to take a specific action, such as a change in policy, not condemn individual companies.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
